channel.title: Design Starter Kit
channel.description: A Design starter kit for students at The Iron Yard.

item.title: (Updated) Common Design Patterns and UI
item.description:
Here are some sites that collect common patterns for the web and mobile world. Also, here’s a list of resources and advice about putting these practices into place.

Common Design Patterns on the web

  • CodePen’s Pattern Curation
  • Brad Frost’s Pattern Library

Common Design Patterns on mobile apps

  • UI Patterns
  • Mobile Patterns
  • Mobile Patterns (2)
  • Inspired UI

Polishing and Precise Design (for both Web and mobile)

  • Pixel Perfect Precision (PDF)
  • UI for Developers

item.title: On Design, beyond aesthetics
item.description:
Design goes way past the aesthetics. Here are a set of articles to change your thinking about design. That Frank Chimero one is extremely poignant.

  • How do you know when a design is really done
  • Dan Mall on Creative Direction
  • Changing behavior through persuasive design
  • Frank Chimero’s What the screen wants
  • Dieter Rams’ 10 Design Principles
  • Designing for emotion

item.title: Web Typography
item.description:
Here are a few resources for Web Typography:

  • TypeCast
  • 95% of web design is typography
  • Advanced Web Typography by Elliot Jay Stocks
  • CopyPasteCharacter
  • Quotes and Accents – Jessica Hische
  • Typ.io (Web Typography gallery)

item.title: Branding and Style Guides
item.description:
Branding and style guide theories from marketing and branding/ad agencies are finally making their way into the web world. Here is some inspiration and resources on logos and creating a style guide, which is a document designed to explain a design system (of fonts, colors, voice, etc).

Branding

  • LogoDesignLove’s brand identity style guides list
  • Find Brand Guidelines on the web
  • Designing Brand Identity - book
  • The Brand Gap

Style Guides

  • https://dribbble.com/shots/1835799-Housing-UI-Style-Guide/attachments/306303
  • https://dribbble.com/search?q=ui+style+guides
  • http://styleguides.io/
  • http://5by5.tv/webahead/28
  • https://gdstechnology.blog.gov.uk/2014/12/11/govuk-living-style-guide/

item.title: Design History
item.description:
Everything repeats itself in Design. Learning the history of design helps designers and developers learn about the connotations that different movements have on the viewer/user’s subconscious.

Read up on Design History.

Branding

  • LogoDesignLove’s brand identity style guides list
  • Find Brand Guidelines on the web
  • Designing Brand Identity - book
  • The Brand Gap

Style Guides

  • https://dribbble.com/shots/1835799-Housing-UI-Style-Guide/attachments/306303
  • https://dribbble.com/search?q=ui+style+guides
  • http://styleguides.io/
  • http://5by5.tv/webahead/28
  • https://gdstechnology.blog.gov.uk/2014/12/11/govuk-living-style-guide/
